com.tdgame
Class Tower

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component

                      com.tdgame.Tower
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
TowerTypes
public class Tower
extends javax.swing.JButton

This class is responsible for maintaining the tower characteristics like: “Type”, “Ammunition”, “Range”, “Cost”, Rate of Fire”, “Refund Rate” and “Ammunition Cost”. Each tower has different images and other properties like x-y position to determine its position on the map.

Version:
$Revision
Author:
Team 2
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

setTowerProperties

public void setTowerProperties(int id,
                               int cost,
                               int ammunition,
                               int range,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               int rateOfFire,
                               java.lang.String path)
This method sets the properties of the tower

Parameters:
id - unique identifier for towers
cost - to buy tower
ammunition - quantity of bullets available
range - power range of tower
type - type of tower
rateOfFire - rate at which tower fires
path - tower image path
